room1.text: hello, name. what kind of jew are you?

room2.text: Are you sure you want to choose that class?

room3.text: you wake up in a jail cell. You do not remember what happened. Press 6 to search the room, press 12 to try to pick the lock, press 5 to try to break the bars, or press 16 to try to convince the guard to let you go.

room4.text: With your mighty strength, you break the bars and exit the cell. Press 8 to continue.

room5.text: You failed, as you have weak, noodley arms. Press 3 to restart.

room6.text: You find a key! Press 18 to continue.

room7.text: you unlock the door! Press 8 to continue.

room8.text: You are confronted by a guard. Press 9 to try to convince him to let you leave, or press 10 to fight him.

room9.text: You try to convince the guard to let you go. Press 14 to continue.

room10.text: You fight the guard. Press 17 to continue.

room11.text: You convince the guard to let you go. Press 14 to continue.

room12.text: You attempt to pick the lock. Press 19 to continue.

room14.text: Congratulations! You have escaped! Press 3 to play again, or press 20 to close the game.

room15.text: You attempt to convince the guard to let you go, but you fail, and the guard begins to attack you. Press 10 to continue.

room16.text: The guard tells you that you smell weird and are bad, so you can't leave. Press 10 to try to fight the guard, or press 3 to restart.

room17.text: You died. Press 3 to restart or press 20 to exit.

room 18.text: You have a key. Press 7 to unlock the door.

room19.text: You do not have a lockpick. Nice try, idiot. Press 3 to restart.
